main.try_again: Sorry, it seems like you have some errors in your sudoku.
main.invalid_cell_count: Invalid empty cell count. Please see the instructions below for more information.
main.rules:
Sudoku grid consists of 9x9 spaces. You can use only numbers from 1 to 9. 
Each 3×3 block can only contain numbers from 1 to 9. 
Each vertical column can only contain number from 1 to 9.
Each horizontal row can only contain numbers from 1 to 9. 
Each number in the 3×3 block, vertical column or horizontal row can be used only once. 
The game is over when the whole Sudoku grid is correctly filled with numbers.
main.game_instructions: To start a game, go to Play-tab in the bottom menu and select level of difficulty. A random board from availbale boards will be chosen. You can mark a number you are uncertain of by marking a cell with this number, then clicking on "Mark/unmark number", same goes for unmarking. Fill out all cells then press "Complete level" button to see the answer. You can start a new game whenever you like by pressing "Start new sudoku" button. To create your own boards go to "Create board"-tab.
main.important: Important! When changing value of a cell, make sure to first remove the old value, before inserting a new value!
